welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Masera di Padova, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in all the city has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at S. Angelo Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
